name: Star Fighter (itch) (emrecolak55)
description:
Galaxy is under attack. You are the last defender of galaxy. Prepare and fight!

Enjoy the game and leave a comment if you like.

INSTRUCTIONS:

Use "ARROWS" to move your spaceship and hold "SPACE" to shoot.

You have 2500 health at first and it can be seen on top left of the screen.

You can see the score on top right.

All enemies have different health ( 100 to 15000 ) and different damage.

Note : If you're unable to downlad, go to my dashboard and choose web version. Also available for mobile devices.
